title: Our Shore Route
name: Our Shore Route
description:
A Map by Dougherj

Description of the best path to Avalon

properties.name: Alternative route - Ferrell Road cutoff
properties.description: Posted by DougherjYou are cruising down Rt 538 to Buck Rd to get on high speed Route 55. If you are adventurous, you can make a left here at Ferrell (firehouse on the right at the intersection) and zip over to Route 55 here. This can be faster. Ferrell becomes Ellis Mill Rd but you stay on the same road for the few miles to 55. It\'s a bit longer, but you get on the high speed road sooner.

properties.name: Avalon home
properties.description: Posted by Dougherj256 45th Street, Avalon, NJ

properties.name: Carol's Custard
properties.description: Posted by Dougherj  Small summer only custard stand on Route 83 that connects Rt 47 (the legendary Delsea Drive) with Rt 9. Common path to Avalon.

properties.name: Collegeville Home
properties.description: Posted by Dougherj1736 Morgan Lane, Collegeville, PA

properties.name: Commodore Barry Bridge
properties.description: Posted by DougherjOur back route to the shore (Avalon and south on Jersey Shore)

properties.name: Ed & Katy Woltemate's place
properties.description: Posted by DougherjRight on our shore route is Holly Place(?) where Ed & Katy have their vacation home. The detail within Holly Place is not accurate.

properties.name: Karen & Rei's Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Dougherj 1882 N Route 9, Cape May Ct Hse, NJJust the best. Just outside of Avalon. (609) 624-8205

properties.name: Left to Route 55
properties.description: Posted by DougherjHere\'s where you leave 538 with a left and a right onto the entrance ramp to 55 in less than 1/8 mile. 55 South of course

properties.name: Our Shore Wawa
properties.description: Posted by Dougherj Popular Wawa that marks the turn to the backroads.

properties.name: Route 347
properties.description: Posted by DougherjRoute 3473 miles after 55 end and joins rt 47, veer left for 8 miles on 347 (becomes 670, but there\'s no marker) to save about 10 miles. After 8 miles, 347 rejoins 47.

properties.name: Route 538
properties.description: Posted by DougherjRoute 538Veer left here off of 666. You\'ll take 538 for awhile

properties.name: Route 83
properties.description: Posted by DougherjVeer left onto Rt 83 for a couple of miles to Rt 9. There you make a right onto 9 south and look for the sign into Avalon. When returning from shore, check out the sign for Route 83 which indicates Camden. Route 83 runs for no more than 4 miles. Camden is 70 miles away.

properties.name: Rt 9 south
properties.description: Posted by Dougherjright turn to Route 9 down just a few miles to Avalon Blvd to go into Avalon

properties.name: Schuykill Expressway & 'Blue Route' I-476
properties.description: Posted by DougherjTake I-476 South to I-95 South. This is the way to get to our back route to Avalon and one choice for heading to Loyola.

properties.name: Vesuvius Pizza
properties.description: Posted by Dougherj Swedesboro, NJGood restaurant, make right (going to shore and then the first left onto 666 (less than an 1/4 mi, at gas station)
